metadata.title: CVE-2017-12964 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: There is a stack consumption issue in LibSass 3.4.5 that is triggered in the function Sass::Eval::operator() in eval.cpp. It will lead to a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: libsass package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
